name: part_006
file: tmp_【 超重大告知あり‼ 】#鷹嶺ルイ生誕バンドLIVE 『L -challenger-』【生バンド3D LIVE】 [dLybZ8wDxVo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Continuation of the performance of 'FIRST CRY' by Takane Lui and Tokoyami Towa.
Transition and instrumental intro for the next song.
Takane Lui performs her original song 'CHARISMA'.
MC section where Takane Lui talks about the guest segment and the song 'CHARISMA'.

subtitles.original: 混濁と闇を揺らそうか
subtitles.english: Shall we shake the turbidity and darkness?

subtitles.original: 解けない答えを塗りつぶした
subtitles.english: Painted over the unsolvable answers.

subtitles.original: どうせ真っ白くもないよと
subtitles.english: Saying it's not pure white anyway.

subtitles.original: 惑わされてくすぐに越えて
subtitles.english: Being led astray, cross it immediately.

subtitles.original: それは祈るような啜り泣きだって
subtitles.english: Even if it's a prayer-like sob.

subtitles.original: 私はあなたを救える言葉を知らないけど
subtitles.english: I don't know the words that can save you, but...

subtitles.original: 寂しいねって声をかけた
subtitles.english: I said, "It's lonely, isn't it?"

subtitles.original: 何千回ともう一度死に損なおう
subtitles.english: Let's fail to die once more, thousands of times.

subtitles.original: 希望と絶望の様な顔を纏って
subtitles.english: Wearing a face like hope and despair.

subtitles.original: 何千回ともう一度息を食らえ
subtitles.english: Swallow your breath once more, thousands of times.

subtitles.original: 私も続くよ 窓の向こう側へ
subtitles.english: I'll follow too, to the other side of the window.

subtitles.original: 醜い光を愛せた時
subtitles.english: When we can love the ugly light.

subtitles.original: 終わらせたかった産声を
subtitles.english: The first cry we wanted to end.

subtitles.original: 歌にしよう
subtitles.english: Let's turn it into a song.

subtitles.original: 歌にしよう
subtitles.english: Let's turn it into a song.

subtitles.original: 歌にしよう
subtitles.english: Let's turn it into a song.

subtitles.original: リッパーのこの刃面に
subtitles.english: On this blade face of the ripper.

subtitles.original: 泥をつけて這っていた
subtitles.english: Crawling with mud on it.

subtitles.original:
CHARISMA
作詞・作曲・編曲：jon-YAKITORY
subtitles.english:
CHARISMA
Lyrics, Music, Arrangement: jon-YAKITORY

subtitles.original: 鳴らせ 研いだ爪立てて
subtitles.english: Make it ring, with sharpened claws.

subtitles.original: 信じられるものは自分だけだと
subtitles.english: Convinced that I was the only one I could believe in.

subtitles.original: 思い込んで進み続けた
subtitles.english: I kept moving forward.

subtitles.original: あの子みたいにすれば
subtitles.english: If I do it like that girl...

subtitles.original: 君じゃそれは無理だ
subtitles.english: “It's impossible for you.”

subtitles.original: 言わせておけばいいさ
subtitles.english: Just let them say what they want.

subtitles.original: たった一人 逆境の先
subtitles.english: All alone, beyond the adversity.

subtitles.original: あいつらから奪い去れ
subtitles.english: Snatch it away from them.

subtitles.original: 私の邪魔させやしない
subtitles.english: I won't let them get in my way.

subtitles.original: 雷火の影 見据えた髪
subtitles.english: Hair that gazed at the shadow of the lightning fire.

subtitles.original: 荒野の果てから空へと
subtitles.english: From the end of the wasteland to the sky.

subtitles.original: 飛んで行く私を見ないなんて Bad boy
subtitles.english: Not looking at me as I fly away, what a bad boy.

subtitles.original: 失敗は止まった時
subtitles.english: Failure is when you stop.

subtitles.original: 今日も挑み張っている
subtitles.english: Today too, I'm challenging and holding on.

subtitles.original: 意味のないものはないと
subtitles.english: Thinking there's nothing without meaning.

subtitles.original: 信じられるものを
subtitles.english: Until I find something...

subtitles.original: 見つけ出すまで
subtitles.english: ...I can believe in...

subtitles.original: 泥に足掻いて笑い飛ばした
subtitles.english: ...I struggled in the mud and laughed it off.

subtitles.original: あの子はもう終わりだ
subtitles.english: “That girl is finished.”

subtitles.original: これ以上はないな
subtitles.english: “There's nothing more than this.”

subtitles.original: 言わせておけばいいさ
subtitles.english: Just let them say what they want.

subtitles.original: いつか光が灯り冷めても
subtitles.english: Even if the light turns on and cools down someday.

subtitles.original: 夢見ていた大喝采
subtitles.english: The great applause I was dreaming of.

subtitles.original: 私はここで死にたくねえ
subtitles.english: I don't want to die here.

subtitles.original: 一生の旅 逆境の先
subtitles.english: A lifelong journey, beyond the adversity.

subtitles.original: あいつらから奪い去れ
subtitles.english: Snatch it away from them.

subtitles.original: 私の邪魔させやしない
subtitles.english: I won't let them get in my way.

subtitles.original: 雷火の影 見据えた髪
subtitles.english: Hair that gazed at the shadow of the lightning fire.

subtitles.original: 荒野の果てから空へと
subtitles.english: From the end of the wasteland to the sky.

subtitles.original: 飛んで行く私を見ないなんて Bad boy
subtitles.english: Not looking at me as I fly away, what a bad boy.

subtitles.original: Bad boy
subtitles.english: Bad boy

subtitles.original: はい、ということで3曲ゲストパートをお届けして、
subtitles.english: All right, so we've presented three guest tracks,

subtitles.original: 先ほど『CHARISMA』というジョンやきとりさんから書き下ろしていただいた楽曲を歌わせていただきました。
subtitles.english: and just now I sang 'CHARISMA,' a song written for me by jon-YAKITORY.

subtitles.original: いかがだったでしょうかー！
subtitles.english: How did you like it?!
